text: by being on AWS Instructure is able to
focus its resources in the most
important ways we're able to create
product develop product and deliver
product to our end users without having
to worry about the infrastructure and
the management of the infrastructure my
name is Wade Billings i'm the director
of global IT services for Instructure
instructure is a software as a service
provider for learning management systems
we are based out of Salt Lake City Utah
and we have just over 600 employees
instructures software is a learning
management system called Canvas and
Canvas is is focused on K through 12 as
well as higher education and the way
that we provide that learning management
system is via the public cloud on Amazon
Web Services uh this differs from other
learning management systems in that most
LMS's are onrem piece of software that
you install on your own servers and you
manage yourself one of the main benefits
of utilizing instructure over our
competition would be that you don't have
to manage the servers yourself so
instructure utilizes Amazon web services
for uh everything uh we utilize it for
development for QA testing uh for
prototyping as well as our production
workload with Amazon Web Services you
can autoscale your platform and we have
created software that sits on top of the
autoscaling group and allows us to
predictively uh scale our platform based
on our business load so for example last
semester we had 216,000 concurrent users
on the platform and we had just under
2,000 Amazon EC2 instances running and
in order to meet that demand we didn't
have to do anything special we just let
the system work one of the main benefits
of being on Amazon Web Services is that
the security is baked into the platform
so regardless of if I'm a small
organization or a large enterprise I get
the benefit of those intrinsic security
controls that are there and I don't have
to build them i don't have to buy them i
don't have to do anything extra they're
just there eight months ago Instructure
uh embarked on a cost optimization
program we were making sure that every
dollar that we spent was spent in the
most intelligent way possible one of the
ways that we're able to achieve that
goal is by use of a number of tools that
Amazon Web Services provides to us that
gives us visibility into the how and
what of the infrastructure and how those
resources are being used and in the last
6 months we've been able to identify
opportunities uh for optimization that
has reduced our overall infrastructure
spend by about 25% i think the most
important thing for instructure and why
we continue to use AWS is it allows us
to be creative in a very frictionless
way
[Music]
